title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
Hi!

I have here a 820-3437-B board: fan is not spinning, but i have orange/green magsafe light.
No water damage, no drops and under scope inspection everything seems to be nice and clean.
Where you suggest start checking?

Thanks!!!

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
Posting some (exact) voltages from the board.
Like 3V3_S5/SUS and PPBUS_G3H.
Good if you post more...

title: 820-3437-B dead
message: Post voltage for PPBUS_G3H, PPVRTC_G3H, PP5V_S5, PP3v3_S5, PP5v_S4RS3

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 50390"]Posting some (exact) voltages from the board.
Like 3V3_S5/SUS and PPBUS_G3H.
Good if you post more...[/QUOTE]

Here it is:

PPBUS_G3H      8.2v
PPVRTC_G3H    3.3v
PP5V_S5            5v
PP3v3_S5           3.3v
PP5v_S4RS3     0v


Thanks!

title: 820-3437-B dead
message: Your issue is PPBUS it should NOT be 8.2 but rather 8.6. SMC_RESET_L voltage? This is looking like a bad SMC to me. Post that voltage first

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
[QUOTE="johnb8812, post: 50398"]your issue is ppbus it should not be 8.2 but rather 8.6. Smc_reset_l voltage? This is looking like a bad smc to me. Post that voltage first[/quote]

smc_reset_l 3.3v

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
If you get orange light, SMC_RESET_L should be good.
3V3_S5 present also means SMC_PM_G2_EN is OK.

I asked about 3V3_SUS and no response.
If miss it and also PM_SLP_SUS_L, then check all (4) RTC signals from page 12.

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 50400"]If you get orange light, SMC_RESET_L should be good.
3V3_S5 present also means SMC_PM_G2_EN is OK.

I asked about 3V3_SUS and no response.
If miss it and also PM_SLP_SUS_L, then check all (4) RTC signals from page 12.[/QUOTE]

Sorry, i've missed that.
3V3_SUS: 3.3v

title: 820-3437-B dead
message: Is PPBUS 8.2 or 8.6? If 8.2, you have a bad SMC.

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
[QUOTE="JohnB8812, post: 50405"]Is PPBUS 8.2 or 8.6? If 8.2, you have a bad SMC.[/QUOTE]

Tried a mild reflow on SMC, now the fan spins but screen stays black, so i will change SMC.
thanks John!

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
"PM_SLP_SUS_L is 1.06v"
That is bad, should be 3V.
Are you sure?
Strange to get 3V3_SUS then.

If symptom changed after reflowed SMC, reball it.
If still the same, then change it.

Please do NOT quote entire post visible few centimetres above...

title: 820-3437-B dead
message:
Solved: reballed SMC, working perfectly now and passed every test.

Thanks!
